title: Jay Vine Finally out of Neck Brace, Hugo Hofstetter Raced Last 15km of Giro d’Italia with Busted Shoulder
content:
Doctors say Vine can remove his neck brace and resume riding outdoors, while nothing was going to stop Hofstetter from finishing the Giro d'Italia.

Read the full article at Jay Vine Finally out of Neck Brace, Hugo Hofstetter Raced Last 15km of Giro d’Italia with Busted Shoulder on Velo.
author: ahood
